question.title: Syper CSV CsvBeanWriter giving SuperCsvReflectionExceptionerror extracting bean value for field name error
question.body:
public class csvtest {

    public  void main(){
        CsvWriter();
    }

    private static CellProcessor[] getProcessors(){
        final CellProcessor[] processors=new CellProcessor[] {
                new NotNull(),
                new NotNull(),
                new NotNull()
        };
        return processors;
    }
    public void CsvWriter(){
        try {
            csvData data=new csvData("rahul","M",12);
            ICsvBeanWriter beanWriter = new CsvBeanWriter(new
            FileWriter("customer.csv"),CsvPreference.STANDARD_PREFERENCE);

            final String[] header= new String[]{"name","sex","age"};
            beanWriter.writeHeader(header);
            final CellProcessor[] processors = getProcessors();
            beanWriter.write(data,header,processors);
            beanWriter.close();
        }

        catch (Exception e){
            System.err.println(e.getClass().getSimpleName()+e.getMessage());
        }

    }

}

This is my csvData class

class csvData {
    private String name;
    private String sex;
    private int age;
    public csvData(){
        name=null;
        sex=null;
        age=0;
    }
    public csvData(String name1,String sex1,int age1){
        name=name1;
        sex=sex1;
        age=age1;
    }

    public String getName() {return name;}
    public String getSex() {return sex;}
    public int getAge() {return age;}

    public void setname(String name1){name=name1;}
    public void setsex(String sex1){sex=sex1;}
    public void setage(int age1){age=age1;}

}

I don't know what the error is I have been trying to find it for a long time. It does not write to the CSV file. I felt that the getters may be an issue but I cant wrap my head around it.
This is the error:

org.supercsv.exception.SuperCsvReflectionException: error extracting bean value for field name context=null 
    at org.supercsv.io.CsvBeanWriter.extractBeanValues(CsvBeanWriter.java:99) 
    at org.supercsv.io.CsvBeanWriter.write(CsvBeanWriter.java:133)
    at csvtest.CsvWriter(csvtest.java:32)
    at csvtest.main(csvtest.java:12)
Caused by: java.lang.IllegalAccessException: class org.supercsv.io.CsvBeanWriter cannot access a member of class csvData with modifiers "public"
    at java.base/jdk.internal.reflect.Reflection.newIllegalAccessException(Reflection.java:400)
    at java.base/java.lang.reflect.AccessibleObject.checkAccess(AccessibleObject.java:670)
    at java.base/java.lang.reflect.Method.invoke(Method.java:556)
    at org.supercsv.io.CsvBeanWriter.extractBeanValues(CsvBeanWriter.java:96) ... 3 more

Which means it cannot access the getters but I cannot figure out why.
